main event: A fair-sized silver disc-shaped object was observed hovering and maneuvering over the Needham High School in Needham, Massachusetts.
interesting points: The object was observed for at least 5 minutes before disappearing behind trees.
The witness, Miss ******* of Needham, reported the sighting in a calm and concise manner.
The report was provided to the Technical Intelligence Committee at Wright-Patterson Air Force Base by the Public Information Officer of the Smithsonian Institution Astrophysical Observatory.
The report indicates that the description of the object suggests it may have been a balloon observation.
No additional data was requested, and no other report forms were mentioned.
